data.text: @KelleyKga It’s crazy! Why do they like masks??
@mn_libby @KelleyKga Time to stand up Parents. YOU are in charge of your children
@KelleyKga I recommend the CDC stop fear mongering. Present your facts and we can determine how we handle our own health. Its called democracy not autocracy.

@mn_libby @KelleyKga My son’s school will finally be mask  optional on Monday… but “if circumstances change, we reserve the right to reinstate the mask mandate.”  
Over my dead body.
@KelleyKga the masks are to hide their shame over how they’ve handled this “pandemic”

@mn_libby Under current guidelines, they will automatically go back on in August in many districts, assuming we have another summer wave. I don't think Dems in Atlanta got the memo that mask mandates aren't a winning issue.
@KelleyKga True, but politicians will be under pressure with the midterms coming up. I think if they come back, it’ll be after the first Tuesday in November.
@mn_libby Next winter? I'm worried districts in Atlanta and other blue enclaves in the South will be masked up again when school starts back in August.
